news.title: China counters Trump's accusations of Geneva trade deal violations, says U.S. undermining consensus
news.summary: Tensions between U.S. and China flared up after a hiatus following a meeting between Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and his Chinese counterpart in Geneva.

news.title: Steel stocks surge after Trump doubles steel tariffs, Cleveland Cliffs jumps 25%
news.summary: Trump announced at a Pennsylvania rally on Friday that he plans to double tariffs on steel imports to 50% from 25%. Trump: "I want to get rid of the 25% tariff on steel and aluminum"

news.title: Neuralink competitor Paradromics completes first human implant
news.summary: The procedure took place at the University of Michigan with a patient who was already undergoing neurosurgery to treat epilepsy. The patient was already being treated for epilepsy.

news.title: Stephen Curry considers broadcasting, team ownership and PGA Tour Champions as NBA retirement inches closer
news.summary: Stephen Curry is already thinking about his post-NBA plans, which could include broadcasting, team ownership and even playing on the senior PGA Tour.

news.title: SailGP launches sports betting with DraftKings and Bet365
news.summary: SailGP's sports betting push is part of a broader strategic plan to attract new fans, drive deeper engagement and grow the league's popularity.

news.title: Why America’s aging population will be a problem for stocks — and your retirement
news.summary: Long-term focused “M/O ratio’ — or “Middle-Old ratio” — sees a peak for the S&P 500 and opportunity in emerging markets.

news.title: Gold prices doubled in just two years to new highs. Why it could keep going to $7,000.
news.summary: The ‘Sell America’ trade leaves gold buyers with just one question: How much? The U.S. is trying to sell off assets in an effort to boost the economy.

news.title: One of the world’s best-performing stock markets slumps after weekend election
news.summary: Polish stocks fall sharply on Monday as right-wing PiS candidate narrowly wins presidential election. Polish stocks have posted world-beating returns so far in 2025.

news.title: Bristol Myers makes $11 billion deal with BioNTech to join the cancer-drug race
news.summary: Bristol-Myers makes an $11 billion deal with BioNTech to join the new cancer-treatment game. The deal is nearly double the size of Pfizer’s deal announced two weeks earlier.

news.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in June 2025 as ‘The Bear’ and ‘Squid Game’ return
news.summary: 'Ironheart' is the latest Marvel movie to be released by Apple. The movie is based on the Marvel comic book series of the same name. The film was released in theaters on June 14.
